name: Junk Metal
description:
This is a 2D Arena combat game with tank customization elements. The game was really designed for controller, so though there are keyboard controls, you'd probably have a better time if you played with a controller. 

There's a README in the zip that explains the controls.

This is a project I was working on for a couple of months, but I mostly abandoned at this point. All the core gameplay features like combat and customization are implemented, but the game is sorely lacking on content, as well as a progression system.
